function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 pandemic on businesses reliant on office workplace","Impact":"Disruption of business activities and workplace operations due to pandemic","Mitigation":"Implement remote work strategies and flexible workplace modification plans","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, collaboration platforms","People":"Companies relying on office workplace","Owner":"Company leadership"},{"Description":"Negative impact of social distancing on office atmosphere and employee collaboration","Impact":"Isolation and negative influence on employee relationships","Mitigation":"Implement pandemic-proof office design and address social distancing measures","Technologies":"Office design solutions, collaboration technologies","People":"Employees in office workplace","Owner":"Company leadership"}]}
